article_text:
Brittany Howard of Alabama Shakes performs during 2015 Lollapalooza Day One at Grant Park on July 31, 2015 in Chicago, Illinois.

Not at Lollapalooza? Watch clips from some of the festivals biggest acts -- and check out the live stream here!
